Reviews.Title: “Great Service, Superb Location But Currently Bing Refurbished”
Reviews.Author: RObbo60_11
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel mid feb 2012 rome 4 nights primarily watch italy england rugby 6 nations hotel refurbished reception breakfast dining moved annex bit tight breakfast continental style breakfast reasonable choice excellent value money staff superb especially catering staff supplying breakfast reception staff spoken english excellent helpful ignorant people wont learn languages payed £29 person night including tourist tax breakfast hotel close colosseum clean ensuite bathroom tad thoroughly recommend hotel price increase refurb completed cant comment flew lufthansa short stopover frankfurt flying heathrow excellent legroom am 6 foot 2 inches tall plenty seat width seat belt 8 inches spare 44 inch waist superb hotel arranged taxi pick airport 50 euros 9 seater taxi value journey 40 minutes pain train taxi waiting hotel excellent service
